name: Sphereat 2
description:
Back in 2018, i was part of the team that made Sphereat in my college game jam. I was new into coding and everything Unity related so i wasnt able to help a lot.

Now that im confident about my skills, i thought it was time to went back and recreate Sphereat as fast as i can to see if i improved.

It took me 3 hours to get the project done! 

Tilemap assets belong to Ansimuz
